DOC.brief_summary: To validate a high-definition (HD) three-dimensional (3D) visualization system in cataract surgery
DOC.brief_title: High-Definition 3D Visualization System for Ophthalmic Surgery
DOC.criteria: The patients are scheduled to cataract surgery on both eyes. The patients who have other complicating ophthalmic diseases or previous history of ophthalmic surgeries were excluded
